headline: Day 8 of Mr. Trump’s Trial: Ask Me Anything
abstract: Senators are allotted 16 hours to question the opposing legal teams. They’re making the least of it.
lead_paragraph: After fidgeting their way through six days of opening arguments in the impeachment trial of President Trump, rank-and-file senators were at last allowed to participate, as Wednesday kicked off up to 16 hours of question-and-answer time spread over two days.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
